caption=Mrs. Bracegirdle from ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''

Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]] played by [[Lori Dungey]] who was one of the attendees of [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''. When she greets [[Bilbo Baggins
column3: Bilbo]], he is surprised at the number of children she has.
